home.title: Welcome to piqiu 3D Engine
home.subtitle: A collection of interactive 3D demos built with React and piqiu.js.
home.aboutP1: piqiu is a Web-oriented 3D rendering engine focused on engineering practices for WebGL / WebGPU.

basics.title: Basic Geometry
basics.desc: Rendering basic shapes like cubes, spheres, cylinders, etc.

gallery.title: Cases
gallery.subtitle: Core capabilities and typical application scenarios of the piqiu engine

basics.title: Basic Geometry
basics.desc: Examples of rendering basic shapes like cubes, spheres, and cylinders.

gltf.title: GLTF Model Loading
gltf.desc: Efficient parsing and rendering for GLTF / GLB models.

postprocess.title: Post-processing Effects
postprocess.desc: Examples of contours, clipping, wrapping, and other post-processing techniques.

webgpu.title: WebGPU Experiments
webgpu.desc: Exploring next-generation rendering pipelines based on WebGPU.
